security-notice.summary: Security manager does not disable disk probing
security-notice.description: The flag controlling whether the security manager disabled disk probing was being overwritten due to miscalculation in the size of a structure. This meant that the security driver may mistakenly probe disk formats when setting up guest labelling and thus allow access to inappropriate host files.
security-notice.impact: A malicious guest disk image could trick the security drivre into providing access to inappropriate host files
security-notice.workaround: Do not use raw disk images
